title: Strengthening Systems Design Competencies: Personalized Social Studies Learning Using Intelligent E-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Proficiency in Online Learning Platforms and Understanding of Social Studies Foundations
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners complete adaptive algorithm-recommended personalized content (5-minute modules) at an 80% or higher completion rate.
Learners improve their understanding of core social studies concepts by 20% or more through formative assessments (quizzes/feedback).

Learners can select three or more core topics from system-recommended learning paths (e.g., Coursera, Udacity), create a weekly learning plan (including time allocation and resource lists), and achieve an implementation rate of 80% or higher over two weeks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
